Description:
Detects PowerShell calling a credential prompt

Author: John Lambert (idea), Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell Credential Prompt
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where scriptblocktext like '%promptforcredential%'
